A2

Class EStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • A2.EStore

  • public class EStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Date: November 9th, 2015 Description: This class is an EStore which has members map and productList that store products. This Class can add new members to the list or search for specific elements in the list by using the name of the product as the key This EStore class that has an Arrray List and a Hash Map which can perform functions utilizing the ProductRecord, BookRecord and Electronic Record Classes. To use the store I recomend opeinging a new store and calling the menu

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList addProduct(java.util.ArrayList productList)
      parameters: This function takes in an ArrayList of type ProductRecord This method asks the user to input all nessisary information to create a new product and add it to the list and map This void function returns the new updated arraylist
      int exceptionHandlerInt(java.lang.String question, int low, int high)
      parameters: This function takes in a question that is of type string and also the min and max values of the int value should be This method loops asking the user to enter an integer in the range This function returns an integer in the range
      java.lang.String exceptionHandlerString(java.lang.String question, int length)
      parameters: takes in a question of type string and the max length the string should be This method loops asking the user to input a correct string until condition is satisfied This function returns a string with no possible errors.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,ProductRecord> getMap() 
      java.util.ArrayList<ProductRecord> getProductList() 
      void inputFile(java.util.ArrayList productList, java.lang.String cmdLine)
      parameters: Takes in the product list and the command line file path This function is of type void and has no return it just updates the product list with new members that are in the input file This function is called in the main method before the menu function so the EStore has some intial products This void function has no return.
      static void menu(EStore myStore, java.lang.String[] s)
      parameters.com: takes in a EStore instance and a string that holds a file path This method loops through 3 options asking the user to create a new product, Or search the product list and finally quit the program.
      void outputToFile(java.util.ArrayList productList, java.lang.String cmdLine)
      parameters: This function takes in a productList and a command line arguement that holds the file path If the file path is shorter than 5 (just the value i chose because no path is less than length 5 /C:/home/ minimum) This function prints out to an output file weather its provided or not in the correct format that allows the information to be loaded back into the EStore when it is reopened This void function has no return.
      java.lang.String parseData(java.lang.String s) 
      void searchList(java.lang.String keyWords)
      parameters: This function takes in a word or multiple and searches the map to see if the key is in the list To properly use this function you should enter a name of a product and it will search for that product in the list This void function has no return.
      void setMap(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,ProductRecord> map) 
      void setProductList(java.util.ArrayList<ProductRecord> productList)

      • searchList

        public void searchList(java.lang.String keyWords)
        parameters: This function takes in a word or multiple and searches the map to see if the key is in the list To properly use this function you should enter a name of a product and it will search for that product in the list This void function has no return. This function prints out product not in the list if the key is not found
